name: node-image-farmer
description: Image thumbnailing middleware based on connect-thumb. Adds ability to retrieve files from the filesystem.

scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.install-ubuntu-deps: apt-get install graphicsmagick libcairo2-dev libjpeg-dev libgif-dev --fix-missing
scripts.install-mac-deps: brew install graphicsmagick && ( xcode-select --install || echo 'xcode may have already been installed.' ) && brew install pkgconfig pixman libjpeg giflib cairo
scripts.install-redhat-deps: yum install GraphicsMagick cairo cairo-devel libjpeg-devel cairomm-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel pango pango-devel pangomm pangomm-devel giflib-devel
